details: In pustular diseases of skin and night-sweats. Also in gout and chronic rheumatism.

Head: Supraorbital and temporal pain on right side, with lachrymation
Pupils dilated
Face puffy and pale
Stomach: Pain in pit of stomach and region of navel
Feeling of pins and needles at pit of stomach, of EMPTINESS, must eat frequently

name: Taxus baccata
